overview:
Jorge Benitez, as the chief operating officer of Accenture’s Products operating group, has been responsible for executing the business strategy and ensuring operational excellence across a wide set of consumer-relevant industries in seven industry groups: Automotive; Air, Freight & Travel Services; Consumer Goods & Services; Industrial Equipment; Infrastructure & Transportation Services; Life Sciences; and Retail.

Mr. Benitez’s success in business and the broader community has been recognized nationally; Hispanic Business Magazine recently named him to its “2011 Top 25 Corporate Elite” list and in 2004 selected him as one of the 100 most influential Hispanics in the United States.

As managing director of North America and chief executive of the United States office, Mr. Benitez will have primary responsibility for Accentureâ€™s business and operations in North America, including developing and executing the business strategy and ensuring the companyâ€™s growth in these regions.
